theory_metadata.theoretical_tradition: Media studies, communication theory, audience research
theory_metadata.original_purpose: Explain why and how people actively seek out specific media to satisfy particular needs and gratifications

telos.primary_purpose: Understand audience motivations for media consumption and predict media choice based on gratification seeking
secondary_purposes: Identify psychological and social needs served by media
Predict media usage patterns based on audience needs
Explain audience satisfaction with media content
Analyze active vs. passive media consumption
telos.theoretical_scope: Individual-level media consumption behavior and motivation
telos.domain_applicability: Media consumption descriptions, audience surveys, communication behavior analysis, content preference expressions

classification.tier_justification: Explains media consumption behavior through need-gratification relationships and enables prediction of usage patterns

audience_members.definition: Individual media consumers with specific needs and goals

media_content.definition: Communication messages, channels, or platforms available for consumption

needs.definition: Psychological or social deficiencies that create motivation for media consumption

gratifications.definition: Satisfactions obtained from media consumption that fulfill underlying needs

affective_needs.definition: Emotional experiences, aesthetic pleasure, mood management

social_integrative_needs.definition: Social connection, belonging, interaction with others

process_components.need_recognition: Awareness of psychological or social deficiency requiring satisfaction
process_components.media_selection: Choice of specific media content based on expected gratifications
process_components.exposure_behavior: Actual consumption of selected media content
process_components.gratification_assessment: Evaluation of satisfaction obtained relative to needs and expectations
process_components.feedback_loop: Influence of obtained gratifications on future media selection

step_1_applicability_assessment.description: Evaluate text suitability for uses and gratifications analysis

criteria.media_consumption_context: Clear media usage or communication consumption scenario
criteria.audience_need_expressions: Explicit or implicit expressions of psychological/social needs
criteria.gratification_seeking_behavior: Evidence of active media selection or consumption motivation
criteria.satisfaction_evaluation: Expressions of fulfillment, disappointment, or assessment of media experience

step_1_applicability_assessment.scoring: 0.0-1.0 scale based on presence and clarity of need-gratification dynamics
step_1_applicability_assessment.threshold: 0.6 minimum for meaningful uses and gratifications analysis

step_2_audience_identification.description: Identify media consumers and their characteristics
audience_analysis: Extract demographic characteristics of media consumers
Determine social context and situational factors
Map audience roles and relationships to media content

step_3_media_content_analysis.description: Identify and characterize media content being consumed or referenced
content_analysis: Determine content format and presentation style

step_4_need_identification.description: Extract psychological and social needs expressed or implied in the text
need_extraction: Extract affective needs (entertainment, emotional satisfaction, mood management)
Determine personal integrative needs (identity, values, credibility)
Find social integrative needs (connection, conversation, social learning)
Locate tension release needs (escape, diversion, stress relief)
need_assessment: Assess need urgency and temporal characteristics

step_5_gratification_mapping.description: Identify gratifications sought and obtained from media consumption
gratification_analysis: Map gratifications to specific need categories
Assess satisfaction levels and fulfillment quality
satisfaction_evaluation: Assess overall satisfaction with media experience

step_1_need_gratification_matching.description: Analyze how well media content matches audience needs and provides gratifications
matching_analysis: Map specific gratifications to underlying needs
Assess efficiency of media choices for need satisfaction
Identify optimal vs. suboptimal media selection patterns
Evaluate audience sophistication in media selection

step_2_consumption_pattern_analysis.description: Characterize media consumption behavior and motivations
pattern_analysis: Identify active vs. passive consumption behaviors
Analyze selection criteria and decision-making processes
Assess consumption frequency and intensity patterns

step_3_satisfaction_assessment.description: Evaluate gratification fulfillment and audience satisfaction levels
satisfaction_analysis: Measure satisfaction levels across need categories
Identify sources of gratification success or failure

step_4_prediction_generation.description: Predict future media consumption based on need-gratification patterns
prediction_analysis: Predict media selection preferences based on need profiles
Anticipate satisfaction levels with different content types
Identify likely media abandonment or adoption patterns

internal_consistency.need_categorization_coherence: All needs properly categorized within five-category taxonomy
internal_consistency.gratification_mapping_validity: Clear connections between specific gratifications and underlying needs
internal_consistency.audience_characterization_completeness: Comprehensive audience profiling across relevant dimensions
internal_consistency.satisfaction_assessment_logic: Consistent evaluation of gratification fulfillment levels

theoretical_fidelity.active_audience_assumption: Analysis treats audience as active, goal-oriented media selectors
theoretical_fidelity.need_gratification_linkage: Clear connections established between psychological/social needs and media gratifications
theoretical_fidelity.functional_alternative_recognition: Acknowledgment that different media can serve similar functions
theoretical_fidelity.individual_variation_accommodation: Recognition of individual differences in needs and gratification patterns

empirical_validation.need_identification_accuracy: Valid identification of psychological and social needs from textual evidence
empirical_validation.gratification_extraction_completeness: Comprehensive identification of sought and obtained gratifications
empirical_validation.satisfaction_measurement_validity: Accurate assessment of gratification fulfillment levels
empirical_validation.consumption_pattern_characterization: Valid description of media usage behaviors and motivations

predictive_validation.media_selection_prediction: Accurate prediction of media choices based on need profiles
predictive_validation.consumption_frequency_forecasting: Valid prediction of usage patterns and intensity
predictive_validation.satisfaction_prediction: Accurate anticipation of gratification fulfillment levels
predictive_validation.behavioral_continuity_prediction: Valid prediction of continued vs. discontinued media consumption
